Title: Cross-site Scripting
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.27, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.11, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.3.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.27 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.11 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.3.0
